name: R5-MedicationAdministrationStatusCodes-R4-MedicationAdministrationStatusCodes
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MedicationAdministrationStatusCodes into FHIR R4

element.display: All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.

target.display: All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.

element.display: The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.

target.display: The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.

element.display: The administration has started but has not yet completed.

target.display: The administration has started but has not yet completed.

element.display: The administration was terminated prior to any impact on the subject (though preparatory actions may have been taken)

target.display: The administration was terminated prior to any impact on the subject (though preparatory actions may have been taken)

element.display: Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called 'suspended'.

target.display: Actions implied by the administration have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called 'suspended'.

element.display: Actions implied by the administration have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

target.display: Actions implied by the administration have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred.

element.display: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this request. Note: This concept is not to be used for 'other' - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.

target.display: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this request. Note: This concept is not to be used for 'other' - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.
